mods.name: Minecraft Forge
mods.description: Minecraft Forge is a modding API used by alot of mods.

mods.name: CodeChickenLib
mods.description: Needed for ChickenBones mods

mods.name: ForgeMultipart
mods.description: Open source library for facilitation of multiple functional parts in the one block space.

mods.name: World Core
mods.description: Needed for Biomes O Plenty

mods.name: ejml
mods.description: A fast and easy to use dense matrix linear algebra library written in Java. Required for Ic2.

mods.name: ArmorStatusHUD
mods.description: Provides a HUD with your equipped armor/item stats.

mods.name: bspkrsCore
mods.description: Shared classes used in the mods maintained by bspkrs.

mods.name: DirectionHUD
mods.description: Provides a HUD with your magnetic compass heading.

mods.name: InGame Info XML
mods.description: Display extra information on top of your ingame screen.

mods.name: Laser Level
mods.description: In game ruler

mods.name: Stackie
mods.description: Stack entities into groups to decrease lag.

mods.name: StatusEffectHUD
mods.description: Shows active player effects (potions, etc) without opening your inventory!

mods.name: Damage Indicators
mods.description: Displays the damage you inflict on creatures, as well as current health, name and potion effects.

mods.name: Sort Fix
mods.description: Fixes issues with Liquids on servers due to a FML bug.

mods.name: Advanced Machines
mods.description: Yet another chunkloader mod.

mods.name: Advanced Repulsion Systems
mods.description: Adds FORCEFIELDS!

mods.name: Ars Magica 2
mods.description: A look into what Minecraft could become if you add a splash of magic...

mods.name: Applied Energistics
mods.description: A Mod About energy, and matter. Oh wait thats everything...

mods.name: Archimedes' Ships
mods.description: Craft and create your own ship... And sail it across the seven seas!

mods.name: Atomic Science
mods.description: A Minecraft mod about high end fission, fusion reactors and particle physics.

mods.name: Autoutils
mods.description: Utilities for mods by AUTOMATIC_MAIDEN.

mods.name: Backpack
mods.description: Provides the player with multiple, colored backpacks, which each has the space of a normal chest.

mods.name: BdLib
mods.description: This is a collection of generic code used by bdew's other mods

mods.name: BiblioCraft
mods.description: BiblioCraft adds fancy storage containers including bookcases, armor stands, potion shelves, regular shelves, tool racks, glass weapon cases, wooden desks and wooden chest labels and now add machines, redstone interactions, and eyeware! New in 1.3: Fancy lamps and golden lanterns. Also Tables and enchanted plates!

mods.name: BiblioWoods Biomes O'Plenty Edition
mods.description: Adds support for 16 varietys of wood from Biomes O'Plenty for 8 of the wooden block in BiblioCraft.

mods.name: BiblioWoods Forestry Edition
mods.description: Adds support for 24 varietys of wood from Forestry for 8 of the wooden block in BiblioCraft.

mods.name: BiblioWoods Natura Edition
mods.description: Adds support for 13 varietys of wood from Natura for 8 of the wooden block in BiblioCraft.

mods.name: Big Reactors
mods.description: Adds large, multiblock power generation machines to Minecraft. Compatible with Redstone Flux (RF) power.  Special thanks: powercrystals, skyboy, King_Lemming, & Calclavia for example code.

mods.name: Extra Bees and Trees
mods.description: Extra Bees and Extra Trees are addons for Forestry which adds in new species of bees and trees as well as their by products and new machines.

mods.name: Biomes O' Plenty
mods.description: Adds 87 new, unique biomes!

mods.name: BuildCraft
mods.description: Extending Minecraft with pipes, auto-crafting, quarries, engines and much more!

mods.name: Calclavia Core
mods.description: Library required for Calclavia's mods.

mods.name: Carpenter's Blocks
mods.description: Adds slopes and a variety of vanilla-inspired blocks that support covers, side covers, overlays, dyes and chiseled patterns.

mods.name: Chisel
mods.description: Adds a chisel item that lets you carve blocks like cobblestone or sandstone. Adds two new blocks to world generation: marble and limestone, which can be be carved and crafted into many various building materials.

mods.name: CodeChickenCore
mods.description: Core library for all ChickenBones mods

mods.name: CoFH Framework
mods.description: Framework required for all Team CoFH mods.

mods.name: Compact Solar Arrays
mods.description: Compact Solar Arrays, an Industrial Craft 2 mod that adds in three new Solar Panel type blocks.

mods.name: ComputerCraft
mods.description: ComputerCraft adds Computers, Programming and Robotics to Minecraft.

mods.name: CreeperCollateral
mods.description: Stops creepers destroying the items drops when they blow up.

mods.name: DartCraft
mods.description: DartCraft adds in a tonne of new features, machines and mecahnics to Minecraft all centered around Power Ore.

mods.name: denLib
mods.description: den's Library

mods.name: denlibfiles
mods.description: required for denlib.

mods.name: Dimensional Anchors
mods.description: Yet another chunkloader mod.

mods.name: Dynamic Lights
mods.description: Moving Lights aren't possible? OH RLY?

mods.name: Emasher Resource
mods.description: Emasher Resource adds various ores and other resources to the game. All ores have retrogen, can be disabled, and their generation can be fully customized. The ores are for the most part, standard ores that you will find in most major mods. They might have fancy names, but they're all ore-dictionary-compatible with the ores, and ingots from other mods.

mods.name: Ender IO
mods.description: Compact conduits, painted things and access to your stuff through an eye of ender.

mods.name: Ender Storage
mods.description: EnderStorage is a mod that offers a means to store your items in The END, causing them to be everywhere and nowhere at the same time.  All EnderStorage makes use of the magic of colors to link storage with its little piece of The END.  Any EnderStorage with the same color code share inventory (even across dimensions).

mods.name: EngineersToolbox
mods.description: Engineer's Toolbox adds completely customizable modular machines that allow you to add modules to a base block to create much more complex devices. There are modules that do everything from redstone logic, to killing mobs, to creating infinite water sources, and a whole lot more.

mods.name: Equivalent Exchange 3
mods.description: Transmuting items into another.

mods.name: ExtraCells
mods.description: A Mod that adds 4 new ME Storage Cells and some other cool stuff to AE.

mods.name: ExtraTiC
mods.description: An Addon mod for Tinker's Construct and Metallurgy

mods.name: Extra Utilities
mods.description: Just a bunch of fairly useful things

mods.name: Flat Signs
mods.description: FlatSigns provides new sign functionality allowing signs to be placed flat on the ceiling or the floor (via sneak click). You can also make sponges to edit existing signs.

mods.name: Forestry
mods.description: Trees, bees and more.

mods.name: GraveStone Mod
mods.description: Adds GraveStones.

mods.name: GraviGun
mods.description: Adds the HL2 Gravity Gun to Minecraft

mods.name: Greg's Lighting
mods.description: Greg's Lighting is a mod for the game Minecraft. It provides Floodlights, high-powered lamps designed for lighting up large spaces. A floodlight projects a beam of light that extends for up to 64 blocks without diminishing in brightness. You can place them on the ceiling of a high room and they will light up the floor as bright as day.

mods.name: GregTech-Addon
mods.description: This Addon adds the awesome Technology of GregTech-Intergalactical to your World! Fusionreactors, Lightningrods and many other Technologies and convenient Recipes are added by this Addon, if you let them enabled in the allmighty Config, of course

mods.name: Hunger Overhaul
mods.description: Hunger mechanics overhauled

mods.name: IC2 Fixes
mods.description: Fixes broken recipes in IC2

mods.name: Nuclear Control
mods.description: Nuclear Control, an Industrial Craft 2 addon that allows you to build efficient monitoring and notification system for your nuclear reactor. Also you can use Howler Alarm and Industrial Alarm in any case when you want industrial-style notification/alarming system.

mods.name: ICBM
mods.description: Explosives

mods.name: iChunUtil
mods.description: Shared library mod required by several of iChun's Mods.

mods.name: Immibis Core
mods.description: This is like CodeChicken Core, Buildcraft Core, RedPower Core, and so on - it provides requirements for other mods.

mods.name: Immibis's Microblocks
mods.description: They mostly work like RedPower 2's microblocks.

mods.name: Immibis's Peripherals
mods.description: Adds some useful and neat peripherals

mods.name: IndustrialCraft 2
mods.description: Industrial age themed expansion for Minecraft.

mods.name: Infinity Bow Fix
mods.description: Removes the need for a single arrow in the inventory when using an "Infinity I" enchanted bow.

mods.name: Inventory Tweaks
mods.description: Tweaks to inventory handling for ease of use, including sorting and automatic replacement of broken tools or exhausted stacks of items.

mods.name: Iron Chest
mods.description: New chests with larger sizes, with in-place upgrade items.

mods.name: JABBA
mods.description: Just Another Better Barrel Attempt. Attempts to make barrels better.

mods.name: Keithy Utils
mods.description: KeithyUtils provides helper utilities for RebelKeithy's other mods.

mods.name: kris91268's Light Bridges and Doors
mods.description: Adds bridges and doors made of light! as well as a couple of other things. Apply a redstone signal to activate the light bridges and doors, and they extend out for whatever you configure it to be!

mods.name: Logistics Pipes
mods.description: Logistics Pipes is an extensive overhaul of the Buildcraft pipe system. It allows for better distribution of items via pipes, more organised stockkeeping and easier automated crafting.

mods.name: Lucky Block
mods.description: The Lucky Block mod adds just one block, yet over one hundred possibilities to Minecraft! Just mine the Lucky Block, cross your fingers, and hope it will drop the items you need.

mods.name: Magical Crops
mods.description: Every get bored of mining all the time for resources? Want a new way of collecting them? Magical Crops gives you the ability to grow your own resources! Grow Diamonds, Coal, Emeralds or even Experience, Now go and create a vast farm for all your needs!

mods.name: Mekanism
mods.description: Energy, Armor, Tools, Weapons, Machines, Magic.

mods.name: MekanismGenerators
mods.description: Generators module of Mekanism.

mods.name: MekanismTools
mods.description: Tools module for Mekanism.

mods.name: Metallurgy
mods.description: The Metallurgy core

mods.name: MineFactory Reloaded
mods.description: Automate everything!

mods.name: MobiusCore
mods.description: Needed for ProfMobius mods

mods.name: Modular Forcefield System
mods.description: Adds forcefields and security related blocks.

mods.name: MachineMuse's Modular Powersuits
mods.description: A mod which adds modular power armor, power tool, and a tinker table to configure them. Uses UniversalElectricty or IC2 for energy.

mods.name: More Turtles
mods.description: Adds more peripherals for turtles.

mods.name: Morph
mods.description: Morph mod, made for ModJam 2. Allows players to acquire the morph skill and turn into other mobs.

mods.name: Morpheus
mods.description: Morpheus is a server-only mod that adds sleep voting to a forge based server. When a player sleeps, all other players in the same dimension are notified so it is easier to coordinate.

mods.name: Mystcraft
mods.description: Mystcraft brings elements from the Myst series of games and books to Minecraft, as well as allowing players to actually write and travel to their own Ages.

mods.name: Natura
mods.description: Heyo, Redwood trees! Chop them all day long!

mods.name: NEI Addons
mods.description: Adds in mod integration into NEI by showing bee breeding information as well as other helpful mod plugins.

mods.name: NEI Plugins
mods.description: Adds mod integration into NEI

mods.name: Nether Ores
mods.description: Introduces mineable yet dangerous ores to the Nether

mods.name: NotEnoughCodecs
mods.description: This mod is an optional client-side mod that'll allow users to listen to mp3 and aac streams from the OpenBlocks radio.

mods.name: NotEnoughItems
mods.description: Allows you to quickly and easily look up recipes and uses for any item in Minecraft included modded items. Also allows easy spawning of items and a range of one click utilities.

mods.name: Not Enough Keys
mods.description: A very simple mod created to clean up and organize the keybinds gui, organizing mods into their own category and sub menu.

mods.name: No Voidfog No Dimming
mods.description: Removes void fog and dimming

mods.name: Numina
mods.description: A common library of useful functions and utilities for dealing with Minecraft's source code.

mods.name: Obsidian Pressure Plates
mods.description: Provides pressure plates that can only be activated by players (plus NPC, quiet and shrouded variants).

mods.name: OpenBlocks
mods.description: OpenBlocks is a random collection of ideas - ideas the community have suggested, or ideas we thought "Why hasn't anyone done that yet?". There is no theme, it's quite random. It's not even just blocks, as the name suggests!

mods.name: OpenComputers
mods.description: Adds computers than run lua

mods.name: OpenMods Lib
mods.description: This is required for all of OpenBlocks mods.

mods.name: OpenPeripheral Addons
mods.description: Adds extra items for OpenPeripherals

mods.name: OpenPeripheral Core
mods.description: Allows nearly any block to become a computercraft peripheral.

mods.name: Opis
mods.description: Welcome to the wonderful world of Opis, the Minecraft Server profiler.This mod is a must-have for any server admin, as it will allow you to spot the chunks which are eating up your TPS, the worse tile entities or simply jump anywhere you want.

mods.name: Pam's Clay Spawn
mods.description: This mod adds in clay deposits underground with the frequency and density of iron deposits.

mods.name: Pam's Harvestcraft
mods.description: Expanded food system including tons of new crops!

mods.name: PortalGun
mods.description: Add the portal gun and many other portal elements into Minecraft.

mods.name: PowerCrystals Core
mods.description: Mod needed for PowerCrystals Mods

mods.name: Powersuits Addons
mods.description: Addons for Modular Powersuits

mods.name: Project Red Core
mods.description: Redstone. The way it was meant to be.

mods.name: Project Red Compat
mods.description: Redstone. The way it was meant to be.

mods.name: Project Red Integration
mods.description: Redstone. The way it was meant to be.

mods.name: Project Red Lighting
mods.description: Redstone. The way it was meant to be.

mods.name: Project Red Mechanical
mods.description: Redstone. The way it was meant to be.

mods.name: Project Red World
mods.description: Redstone. The way it was meant to be.

mods.name: qCraft
mods.description: Quantum Mechanics meets Minecraft!

mods.name: QuarryPlus
mods.description: This mod add advanced quarry and more.

mods.name: Railcraft
mods.description: Redefine your rails

mods.name: Random Things
mods.description: Random Things packed into one Mod :D

mods.name: Redstone Arsenal
mods.description: Redstone Arsenal adds several new items used to create powerful tools.

mods.name: Remote IO
mods.description: The Remote IO's can be linked to any block with an inventory... imagine this: four separate quarries all outputting into a unique Remote IO linked to a single chest. Gone are the days of pipes! You are also able to link the Remote IO to machines and even use them with fluids!

mods.name: The SecretRoomsMod
mods.description: This mod adds a variety of cool blocks that camouflage themselves to the surrounding world. All of these blocks have extremely useful functions that allow you to simply hide your diamonds, or punish all who dare try to get to them. Hidden doors, pressure plates, hidden levers and more!

mods.name: Slick-Util
mods.description: Slick-Util is a small library to enable you to load various image, sound and font formats for use with LWJGL.

mods.name: Soul Shards: Reborn
mods.description: Recreation of the Old Soul Shards mod.

mods.name: Statues
mods.description: Adds Statues.

mods.name: Steve's Carts 2
mods.description: Steve's Carts 2 introduces a modular system where you can build a huge amount of carts(hundreds of millions) by combining the parts you want.

mods.name: Steve's Factory Manager
mods.description: This mod allows you to move items between different inventories (machines and storage blocks) by specifying it using commands in a flow chart like way.

mods.name: Switches
mods.description: Switches provides alternative switch designs and lever/switch piston-activation.

mods.name: Sync
mods.description: This mod provides clones, or as we like to call it, 'shells'. These shells are basically a new individual, with their own inventory, experience level, and even gamemode.

mods.name: Tinkers' Construct
mods.description: A little of this, a little of that, a lot of tinkering, and a lot of tools

mods.name: Thaumcraft
mods.description: Adding a touch of magic to Minecraft

mods.name: Thaumic Tinkerer
mods.description: An addon to Thaumcraft 4, implementing new content. This mod is a spiritual successor to Elemental Tinkerer. Researches that come from this mod are prefixed by [TT]. Build 24.

mods.name: Thermal Expansion
mods.description: Expanding Minecraft thermally - provides new options for automation and processing!

mods.name: Tinkers' Mechworks
mods.description: Addon for Tinkers Construct

mods.name: Translocator
mods.description: Translocates stuff!

mods.name: Traincraft
mods.description: A mod that adds over 80 trains and other vehicles to the game.

mods.name: Tubes
mods.description: Tubes aims to provide the best item transport and sorting solution using the awesome ForgeMultipart API These tubes work somewhat like the pneumatic tubes in RedPower, but there are many more types of tubes for all sorts of uses.

mods.name: Tubestuff
mods.description: A collection of blocks that are useful with BuildCraft or RedPower.

mods.name: The Twilight Forest
mods.description: An enchanted forest dimension.

mods.name: Underground Biomes Constructs
mods.description: Adds underground biomes composed of layers of new rock types

mods.name: Universal Electricity Core
mods.description: Universal Electricity API

mods.name: Vein Miner
mods.description: A mod to help mine veins of ores by mining blocks of the same type in a chain reaction, giving you the blocks at the end. It is inspired by Connected Destruction by Bspkrs.

mods.name: Vending
mods.description: Adds a vending block that lets you sell items.

mods.name: Waila
mods.description: Waila is an extension for NEI. It will show in the tooltip what mod an item is from. Since the tooltip contains the mod name, you can also easly parse items per mods.

mods.name: Balkon's WeaponMod
mods.description: Throw a spear in a zombie's head! Cut a skeleton in half with your brand new halberd!Shoot some slimes in pieces with an old musket! And more!

mods.name: Witchery
mods.description: Extending Minecraft with witchcraft.

mods.name: WR-CBE Core
mods.description: Redstone Ether with some component items

mods.name: Zan's Minimap
mods.description: Zan's Minimap, also known as VoxelMap, is a minimap for Minecraft supporting waypoints, rotating minimap and entity tracking.

mods.name: MineTweaker
mods.description: Modpack and server tool enabling the addition and removal of recipes
